What’s going on at the border is not lost on Texans in my district. This is an urgent national humanitarian crisis that needs immediate action, and I will continue to work alongside the President and in Congress to fix our nation’s border security problems, 2/3

The national debt has been spiraling out of control, and it’s Congress’ duty to fix the problem. Responsible spending is the first step. That’s why I cannot in good conscience support busting the budget caps and passing the buck to our kids and grandkids.
